title: Sojourn in rural Japan: a youth hostel trip
creator_credit: Shu Taguchi Productions and Japan. National Tourist Organisation
brief_description: A youth hostel trip in the Tohoku district where, more than in any other part of Japan, the old and simple ways still remain. This film shows the Towada National Park and the Yamagata and Hiraizumi areas which attract young people all the year round.
